meanings.definition: A drug used in the treatment of tuberculosis.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed isoniazids to help treat my tuberculosis.
meanings.sent2: Many patients take isoniazids as part of their tuberculosis treatment.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the isoniazids for candy, thinking they would magically cure me.
meanings.sent4: The isoniazids acted like tiny soldiers fighting against the tuberculosis bacteria in my body.
meanings.sent5: The bottle of isoniazids glowed with the promise of healing and recovery.

meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of isoniazids, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy more isoniazids for my next round of medication.
meanings.sent3: The isoniazids on the shelf looked like a colorful army ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, the scientist studied the isoniazids under a microscope to understand their structure.
meanings.sent5: The box of isoniazids rattled with the sound of many tiny pills inside.
